data.text:
@Bob_Wachter @jonlovett @Bob_Wachter Loved seeing you there as you were probably the only straight white male OLDER than me  in the audience (by about a year).

Thank you for how youbhave helped us navigate COVID in Singapore at the start, and now in SF (Corbett Heights).
@Bob_Wachter @jonlovett Listening to it now and cheered when he called you out!  🥰
@Bob_Wachter @jonlovett Covid is not benign.  Yikes although I am sure the shout-out was thrilling
@Bob_Wachter @jonlovett 1562 Americans died from COVID-19 on March 4. Countless more began their Long COVID nightmare. This is benign?
@Bob_Wachter @jonlovett A well-deserved thunderous applause. Thanks for all you do to keep the the  City safe and informed. Also, @jonlovett and @guybranum were a delight as always.
@danwinesalot @Bob_Wachter @jonlovett I don’t have my head up my ass.
